article.title: Creating this blog site: The Struggle
article.content:
[7/25/2020 - 10:02 PM]

After hours and hours of struggle I was able to finally setup my blog's backend and front end. Now I can finally say that my blog is now operational. As I write this I am still on the development stage and would like to improve the UI to give a much more personal taste. Part of it is to push for production once I see the changes that I like.

Actually, I'm thinking of applying a CI/CD Pipeline once I've finished learning more on the process of it. Imagine commiting a small change then seeing the app go live with my changes. That idea is exciting!
